title: The Making of the Making of Titanic
description: Paul Buchman interviews the filmmakers behind the documentary film The Making of Titanic.
quote: They couldn’t get the model boat to, like, sit in the water right, I guess. So they put, um, they had to put like an orange on the side of it or something I’m not sure exactly what they did.
alt4: outtake of James Cameron picking his nose
